# MTLBlitPassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptorArray

**Class**

A container that stores an array of sample buffer attachments for a blit pass.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLBlitPassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptorArray
```

## Overview

The number of elements in the array is at least the number of elements in an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] instance’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/counterSets] property.

## Accessing a sample buffer attachment descriptor

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses one of the array’s blit pass sample buffer attachment descriptor instances.

## Configuring a blit command encoder

- **MTLBlitPassDescriptor**: A configuration you create to customize a blit command encoder, which affects the runtime behavior of the blit pass you encode with it.
- **MTLBlitPassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptor**: A configuration that instructs the GPU where to store counter data from the beginning and end of a blit pass.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
